actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-735.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An act to establish the Fire Island National Seashore, and for other purposes." approved September 11, 1964, (78 Stat. 928).

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-735) Increases from $16,000,000 to $18,000,000 the funds authorized to be appropriated for the acquisition of lands pursuant to the Act establishing the Fire Island National Seashore.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An act to establish the Fire Island National Seashore, and for other purposes." approved September 11, 1964, (78 Stat. 928).
